author: XIAOBOLIU
title: Edx
question:
Should we need to create a new edx account? Now I have two accounts one is for physics last term and one is for cpsc
If I delete one will it affect me?
instructor_answer: edX marks no longer contribute to your overall grade, so strictly speaking, it shouldn't matter. That being said, you'll probably find it most convienient if you have one edX account that you've tied to your CWL.
